title: Artificial Intelligence
paragraph: Artificial Intelligence allows computers to learn, reason, and perform tasks that typically require human intelligence.

title: Data Analysis
paragraph: Data Analysis helps you interpret raw data, identify patterns, and make informed decisions for business and technology.

title: Data Science
paragraph: Data Science combines statistics, programming, and algorithms to extract meaningful insights from large datasets.

title: Cybersecurity
paragraph: Cybersecurity focuses on protecting systems, networks, and data from hackers and cyber threats.

title: Cloud Computing
paragraph: Cloud Computing delivers computing services like servers, storage, and databases over the internet.

title: Coding / Programming
paragraph: Programming is the skill of writing instructions for computers to create software, apps, and digital solutions.

title: UI/UX Design
paragraph: UI/UX Design focuses on making digital products visually appealing, user-friendly, and smooth to use.

title: Soft Skills
paragraph: Soft skills include communication, teamwork, problem-solving, and leadership — essential for every career.

title: Generative AI
paragraph: Generative AI produces text, images, audio, and more using intelligent algorithms and large datasets.

title: Digital Marketing
paragraph: Digital Marketing helps businesses grow through SEO, social media, content marketing, and ads.

title: Financial Literacy
paragraph: Financial literacy teaches budgeting, investing, saving, and planning for a secure financial future.

title: Web UI & Backend Development
paragraph: Web UI and Backend skills allow you to create complete web applications — from frontend design to backend logic.
